metadata.title: CVE-2020-15397 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: HylaFAX+ through 7.0.2 and HylaFAX Enterprise have scripts that executebinaries from directories writable by unprivileged users (e.g., locationsunder /var/spool/hylafax that are writable by the uucp account). Thisallows these users to execute code in the context of the user calling thesebinaries (often root).

criterions.comment: hylafax package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
